headline: January jobs data, Alphabet and Amazon earnings, more Warsh fallout: What to watch this week
summary: Crucial labor market data, more earnings from Big Tech giants, and continued discussion over where Kevin Warsh may lead the central bank should set the agenda in the week ahead.

headline: Is Marathon Petroleum’s Affirmed US$1.00 Dividend Hinting at a Mature Capital Strategy for MPC?
summary: Marathon Petroleum’s board of directors has declared a US$1.00 per-share dividend on common stock, payable March 10, 2026, to shareholders of record as of February 18, 2026, and has scheduled its virtual-only annual shareholder meeting for April 29, 2026. The dividend declaration and fully virtual annual meeting highlight how Marathon Petroleum is pairing ongoing cash returns to shareholders with an increasingly digital approach to corporate governance. We’ll now examine how the affirmed...

headline: Is Marathon Petroleum (MPC) Still Attractive After Its Strong 1 Year Share Price Rise?
summary: If you are wondering whether Marathon Petroleum's current share price still leaves room for value, you are not alone. This article looks at what the numbers are actually saying about the stock. With the share price at US$176.19 and returns of 0.5% over 7 days, 6.7% over 30 days, 6.7% year to date and 23.6% over 1 year, many investors are reassessing what that performance might imply for future risk and reward. Recent news coverage has focused on Marathon Petroleum's position in the US energy...
